about_the_game:
Some Houses Hide a Nightmare That Never Sleeps...
Alessia's Dollhouse is a first-person psychological horror game that will take your breath away. In the dead of night, on a deserted road, you take on the role of Darren, an ordinary pizza delivery guy, in a creepy dollhouse filled with sinister secrets. But this time, your delivery address will drag you into an unimaginable vortex of horror.

Alessia's DollHouse is a New Take on an Old Genre:

A HYPNOTIZING ATMOSPHERE:
Dark corridors, eerie whispers, and a tension ready to be triggered at any moment.



IN THE GRIP OF DESPERATION:
Feel the breath of the terrifying puppets on your neck! There is no escape. You are alone and defenseless. Your only weapon is your mind... and it may not last long.



THREE TERRIFYING DOLLS WITH DISTINCT CHARACTERISTICS AWAIT YOU:
The first doll has a chilling gaze that freezes your soul when you look into its eyes. The second doll silently stalks you from behind, resembling a ghost from your past, lurking in dark corners. The third doll unexpectedly appears, taking you on a journey filled with nightmares. These dolls, each equipped with unique horrifying abilities, create a deep atmosphere of fear and suspense.



THE TRUTH BEHIND THE CURTAIN:
Uncover the disturbing history of the puppet house and tragic events. But some secrets may be better left buried.

CHOICES HAVE CONSEQUENCES:
Your decision will affect Darren's fate and his soul. One wrong step could condemn him to an eternal nightmare.

Remember: Some toys don't just watch. They also play. Alessia's Dollhouse is based on challenge and escape. It is supported by light, loud and sudden sounds. Keep in mind that it makes you feel a lot of fear and is a difficult game.

Developer's comment about the game:
We recommend that people who are afraid of the dark, have a heart condition, and are afraid of being alone should not play alone. If you are easily frightened, turn back now.

WARNING: This game may trigger seizures to people with photosensitive epilepsy. Player discretion is advised.

short_description: Wrong door for a midnight delivery... You are trapped within the walls of a cursed puppet house. Uncover the truth hiding in the darkness and find a way to survive this nightmare.
